head.title: Edit Metadata in {{FileFormatUp}} Files with {{EnvName}} Applications
head.description: Use {{EnvName}} metadata API to edit metadata in {{FileFormatUp}} files. Supports XMP, EXIF, IPTC, ID3, and more.

header.title: Update Metadata in {{FileformatCap}} Files Using {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Metadata Editor for {{ProgLang}} â€“ Edit metadata fields in documents, images, and multimedia files with our API.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is an advanced solution for reading, adding, modifying, deleting, searching, comparing, replacing, and exporting metadata from images and documents. Edit metadata in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Visio, Project, PDF, AutoCAD, ZIP, audio, and video files, along with many other features.

formats.title: Edit Metadata in Various File Formats
formats.description: Multi-format documents and images metadata editing API for {{EnvName}}. Retrieve and edit metadata for popular file formats

examples.comment_1: Update the file's last print date/time metadata after printing
examples.comment_3: Only existing metadata packages are affected. No new packages are added.

steps.title: Steps to Update Metadata in {{FileformatCap}} Using {{EnvName}}

content.title: **[{{ProdFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** allows {{EnvName}} developers to edit metadata in {{FileformatCap}} files with a few easy steps.
content.step_1: Load the {{FileformatCap}} file to be updated.
content.step_2: Specify a predicate to filter desired metadata properties.
content.step_3: Pass the predicate and new value to the UpdateProperties method.

more_features.title: Edit {{FileFormatUp}} Metadata for {{EnvName}} Apps
more_features.description: The {{ProdShortName}} API allows developers to update hidden metadata in various document formats within {{EnvName}} applications. Apply, edit, search for, and remove metadata programmatically.

feature_1.title: Easy Metadata Integration
feature_1.content: {{ProdShortName}} simplifies adding and editing metadata in documents and files within your {{EnvName}} apps. Developers can easily apply, update, or remove metadata.

feature_2.title: Comprehensive Metadata Control
feature_2.content: The API provides extensive options for customizing metadata. Easily find, remove, or update metadata in files using specialized queries.

feature_3.title: Use Native {{FileFormatUp}} Features
feature_3.content: Leverage built-in metadata features like EXIF for images, which can include camera model, resolution, creation date, and more.

code_1.title: Update the Lyrics Tag in an MP3 File (Example)
code_1.content: This example shows how to update hidden metadata in an MP3 file.
code_1.comment_3: Add a custom field to the tag
